description:
The form info component controls the reusable text-based parts of a form
control like labelling, error messages, and instructional text. These items
are combined with other components to create form layouts.
name: Form Info
usage:
The **form info** components are combined with other components to create form layouts and communicate information to the user. #### Standard Label with Textbox ```html
``` #### Standard Instructional Text ```html
Instructional Text
``` Adding an ID value to the `form__text` will allow you to associate this information with the textbox by adding `aria-describedby="text-1234"` to the input. This ID should be unique. #### Standard Error ```html
Error Text
``` Adding an ID value to the `form__error` will allow you to associate this information with the textbox by adding `aria-describedby="text-1234 error-1234"` (using two values allows you to associate two bits of information, in this case, the text and the error) to the input. This ID should be unique. For errors, the input should also be set to invalid with: `aria-invalid="true"`
